mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.provide AS "provide.id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.incoming_date AS "incomingDate", a.incoming_code AS "incomingCode", a.incoming_type AS "incomingType", a.delivery_number AS "deliveryNumber", a.invoice_value AS "invoiceValue", a.invoice AS "invoice", a.bill_date AS "billDate", a.apply_user AS "user.id", a.apply_job AS "userJob.id", a.apply_cause AS "cause", a.deadline_date AS "deadLineDate", a.file AS "file", a.type AS "type", a.extend1 AS "extend1", a.extend2 AS "extend2", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", p.name AS "provide.name", u20.name AS "user.name", o21.name AS "userJob.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u20 ON u20.id = a.apply_user LEFT JOIN sys_office o21 ON o21.id = a.apply_job LEFT JOIN plm_provide_info p ON p.id = a.provide
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plm_incoming_entry( id, provide, proc_ins_id, incoming_date, incoming_code, incoming_type, delivery_number, invoice_value, invoice, bill_date, deadline_date, apply_user, apply_job, apply_cause, file, type, extend1, extend2, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{provide.id}, #{procInsId}, #{incomingDate}, #{incomingCode}, #{incomingType}, #{deliveryNumber}, #{invoiceValue}, #{invoice}, #{billDate}, #{deadLineDate}, #{user.id}, #{userJob.id}, #{cause}, #{file}, #{type}, #{extend1}, #{extend2}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE plm_incoming_entry SET provide = #{provide.id}, proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, incoming_date = #{incomingDate}, incoming_code = #{incomingCode}, incoming_type = #{incomingType}, delivery_number = #{deliveryNumber}, invoice_value = #{invoiceValue}, invoice = #{invoice}, bill_date = #{billDate}, deadline_date = #{deadLineDate}, apply_cause = #{cause}, file = #{file}, type = #{type}, extend1 = #{extend1}, extend2 = #{extend2}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
